translation.gettingStartedBody: TON.Vote is a completely decentralized, on-chain DAO governance platform built exclusively for the TON ecosystem. /n Setting up a Space for your project requires 2 stages: /n 1.Space Details: Basic details about your project. /n 2.Create Space: Owners, admins and special roles. /n Each stage is deployed as a smart contract on the TON blockchain and requires you to sign a transaction in your TON wallet. /n Any change to one of the above stages once deployed, will also require you to sign another transaction. /n *The reason for creating two separate smart contracts is that changes in the Stages's details (such as website url update, New Telegram channel, etc. which are more likely to change), will not entail re-deployment of the Registration contract. /n Need help? Join the TON.vote Telegram [support channel](https://t.me/TONVoteSupportGroup).
translation.editSpaceDetailsWarning: Edits will require to sign a transaction in your wallet
translation.projectAboutTooltip:
